paper_abstract: A new optimization-based synchronized flux-corrected conservative interpolation (remapping) of mass and momentum for arbitrary Lagrangian-Eulerian hydro methods is described. Fluxes of conserved variables - mass and momentum - are limited in a synchronous way to preserve local bounds of primitive variables - density and velocity. Published by Elsevier Inc.
paper_title: Optimization-based synchronized flux-corrected conservative interpolation (remapping) of mass and momentum for arbitrary Lagrangian-Eulerian methods
